actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to establish a program to increase part-time career employment within the civil service.
short_title: Federal Employees Part-time Career Employment Act

summary.text: Federal Employees Part-Time Career Employment Act - Requires the head of each Federal agency to establish and maintain a program for part-time career employment. Requires the Civil Service Commission to conduct a demonstration program to determine the extent to which part-time personnel can be utilized in managerial and professional positions and the extent to which job-sharing arrangements may be established in various occupations.

titles.title: Federal Employees Part-time Career Employment Act
A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to establish a program to increase part-time career employment within the civil service.
